ServiceDescriptionKind ServiceDescriptionKind Enum

Enumerates the kinds of service descriptions.

Edit

In this Article

public enum ServiceDescriptionKindPublic Enum ServiceDescriptionKind

Fields

Invalid Invalid

All Service Fabric enumerations have a reserved Invalid flag.
Stateful Stateful

Indicates a stateful service.
Stateless Stateless

Indicates a stateless service.
